settings.quote: It's definitely a premium accessory but well worth the money for those advanced and adept gamers.
It Can Put You At The Top Of The Leaderboard
HexGaming has the best custom PS5 controller currently available. This is the custom PS5 pad that you’ve been searching for to aid you in dominating this generation.

HexGaming truly outsmarted a lot of its competition by using the first-party controller as a starting point and worked from there instead of creating something that was bound to be inferior from scratch.
HexGaming controller is effectively a DualSense in every way, shape, and form.

settings.text:
1. COMFORT AND ERGONOMIC BUTTONS LAYOUT FOR OPTIMAL CONTROL

Use more of your hand, keeping thumbs on the Thumbstick. Back control functions reinvented the game and are the determining factor for competitive gamers. Enter remap mode with dedicated setting buttons on-the-fly.

2. ENHANCE PRECISION WITH INTERCHANEABLE THUMBSTICKS

2 kinds of height and 3 ergonomic design, domed, concave, and concave widened thumbsticks for movement control or accuracy for different hand sizes and fit your playstyle. Get the edge in FPS esports games with better aiming accuracy.

3. HAIR TRIGGER CLICKY FOR ULTRA-FAST RESPONSES

The Hex hair triggers decrease the triggers activate distance to just 1.5mm, all you need to do is press slightly to instantly launch a full fast shoot to save valuable time in competitive games. *These triggers do not work for racing games.

4.MORE OPTION FOR HIGH PERFORMANCE

Add comfort and grip with an unmatched faceplate and components that fits your controller's look and feel. Rubberized handles can enhance hand feeling and get a better grip to your controller.

settings.title: WARRANTY
settings.text: HEXGAMING provides a 3-month (90 days) warranty.

settings.title: SHIPPING & DELIVERY
settings.text: Free Shipping by DHL Express, 6-12 days for delivery.

settings.title: REFUNDS & EXCHANGES
settings.text: HEXGAMING provides a 30-day trial period to experience your hex controller.

settings.quote: This is a highly altered controller, coming with major aesthetic changes as well as some performance changes.
If you have someone in the family who has aspirations of esports or competitive gaming, hexgaming controller is a great gift option.
Make no mistake, Hexgaming controller is built for FPS games.
The Hex Rival is a top-of-the-line controller for PS5
HexGaming starts with a basic DualSense PS5 controller and then upgrades into an esports-ready beast of a pro controller that’s superior in almost every way.

settings.text:
1. COMFORT AND ERGONOMIC BUTTONS LAYOUT FOR OPTIMAL CONTROL

Use more of your hand, keeping thumbs on the Thumbstick. Back control functions reinvented the game and are the determining factor for competitive gamers. Enter remap mode with dedicated setting buttons on-the-fly.

2. ENHANCE PRECISION WITH INTERCHANEABLE THUMBSTICKS

2 kinds of height and 3 ergonomic design, domed, concave, and concave widened thumbsticks for movement control or accuracy for different hand sizes and fit your playstyle. Get the edge in FPS esports games with better aiming accuracy.

3. HAIR TRIGGER CLICKY FOR ULTRA-FAST RESPONSES

The Hex hair triggers decrease the triggers activate distance to just 1.5mm, all you need to do is press slightly to instantly launch a full fast shoot to save valuable time in competitive games. *These triggers do not work for racing games.

4.MORE OPTION FOR HIGH PERFORMANCE

Add comfort and grip with an unmatched faceplate and components that fits your controller's look and feel. The backplate improves comfort and control.

1. COMFORT AND ERGONOMIC BUTTONS LAYOUT FOR OPTIMAL CONTROL

Use more of your hand, keeping thumbs on the thumbsticks. Back control functions reinvented the game and are the determining factor for competitive gamers. Enter remap mode with combo buttons on-the-fly.

2. ENHANCE PRECISION WITH INTERCHANEABLE THUMBSTICKS

3 kinds of height and 2 ergonomic design, concave and domed thumbsticks for movement control or accuracy for different hand sizes and fit your playstyle. Get the edge in FPS esports games with better aiming accuracy.

3.TRIGGER CONTROL MECHANISM FOR ULTRA-FAST RESPONSES

You'll have the flexibility to modify trigger control according to your playstyle across games like racing or shooting. Milliseconds make all the difference, all you need to do is press slightly to instantly launch full fast shoot to save valuable time.

4. MORE OPTION FOR HIGH PERFORMANCE

Add comfort and grip with an unmatched smooth touch faceplate and components that fits your controller's look and feel. The panels improves comfort and control.

1.COMFORTABLE AND ERGONOMIC BACK BUTTONS FOR MAPPING

Maximum assign 14 buttons (Cross, Circle, Triangle, Square, Up, Down, Left, Right, L1, L2, R1, R2, L3, R3 ) to the rear buttons during the game.

2.ENHANCE PRECISION WITH DETACHABLE THUMBSTICKS

8 in-1 thumbsticks for movement control or accuracy for different hand sizes that fit your playstyle.

3.HAIR TRIGGERS CLICKY FOR INSTANT RESPONSES

The Hex hair triggers decrease the triggers activate distance to just 1.5mm, all you need to do is press slightly to instantly launch a full fast shoot to save valuable time in competitive games. *These triggers do not work for racing games.

4.MORE OPTIONS FOR HIGH PERFORMANCE

Comfortable faceplates and buttons enhance your controller's look and feel.

settings.title: Test Guide
settings.text:
1. Use the original data cable to connect to the PC, press any button, and wait for a successful connection;
2. Please press all the buttons individually, the interface will display the corresponding pressed button;
3. After depressing the L3R3 joystick, slowly push the joystick along the circular "+" solid line; from the center point to the outer edge, slowly push the joystick several times to make a circle;

settings.title: Four Remappable Buttons
settings.text: Save up to 6 different paddle remapping profiles and switch between them on-the-fly with the press of setting button.

settings.title: Interchangeable Thumbsticks
settings.text: 8 in 1 interchangeable textured thumbsticks, 2 different heights, 3 different ergonomic thumb grip designs, domed, concave, and concave widened.

settings.title: Adjustable Triggers
settings.text: Flip the switches and the trigger will go from a smooth full-pull to a short mouse clicky action.

settings.title: Rubberized Grip Faceplate
settings.text: Soft rubber grip helps you be in perfect command of all kinds of gaming.

settings.title: Four Remappable Buttons
settings.text: Save up to 6 different paddle remapping profiles and switch between them on-the-fly with a double-click of the setting button.

settings.title: Interchangeable Thumbsticks
settings.text: 6 in 1 interchangeable thumbstick, 3 different heights, 2 different ergonomic thumb grip designs, domed or concave.

settings.title: Digital Trigger Mechanisms
settings.text: The clicky triggers' active distance shorten to just 1.5mm.

settings.title: Smooth Touch Grip Faceplate
settings.text: Comfort faceplates and buttons enhance your controller's look and feel.

settings.text:
1.COMFORT AND ERGONOMIC BUTTONS LAYOUT FOR OPTIMAL CONTROL

You can save up to 6 different paddle remapping profiles and switch between them on-the-fly with a double-click of the setting button.

2.ENHANCE PRECISION WITH INTERCHANGEABLE THUMBSTICKS

8 in-1 thumbsticks for movement control or accuracy for different hand sizes that fit your playstyle.

3.ADJUSTABLE TRIGGERS CONTROL MECHANISM FOR DIFFERENT GAMES REQUIRE

Flip the switches and your triggers will go from a smooth full-pull to a short mouse clicky action.

4.MORE OPTIONS FOR HIGH PERFORMANCE

Soft rubber grip for better grip. Comfort faceplates and buttons enhance your controller's look and feel.
